charinfo.name: ET Nidaime Tsuchikage (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Nidaime Tsuchikage (S) has been revived against his will to do battle. He will take advantage of the situation to make sure that the Hidden Rock Village benefits from this war.

abilities.name: Chameleon Jutsu
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Nidaime Tsuchikage (S) uses Chameleon Jutsu gaining 33% unpierceable damage reduction for 3 turns. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Fission
abilities.description: Using Fission Edo Tensei Nidaime Tsuchikage(S) targets one enemy and deals 10 damage for 2 turns. One other random enemy will also be dealt 10 damage for 2 turns. During this skill Edo Tensei Nidaime Tsuchikage (S) will ignore stuns and affliction damage. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Dust Release
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Nidaime Tsuchikage (S) uses Dust Release on one enemy dealing 40 piercing damage. This skill cannot be countered.

abilities.name: Sensor Evasion
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Nidaime Tsuchikage (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
